resources.string:
•This game gives the shortest path between any two points on the grid. 
 • To set the obtacles first click on the blocked node and then click within the white grid. 
 • To remove the obstacle click on it. 
 • Click on the green node to set the start position 
 • Click on the red node to set the end position 
 • You can choose only one start and end point 
 • To change the start and end position or the obstacles click on it. 
 • Click on Play button to get the shortest path.
